completion.item: Removes all stored listeners on the page unload.

Adds a listener to a specified domNode and store the added event in the event manager.
Parameters: (HTMLElement) domNode - the node where the event is added to (DOMString) type - the event type (Object|Function) listener - the desired action handler
Returns: generated event-object for this listener
handleEvent is used to catch the unload-event of the window and pass it to _unregisterAllEvents() to free up memory.

Removes a specified event
Parameters: (Event) event - object which is returned by addListener()
